monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Destroys diamond blocks
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Armor Up
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 75% Defense) Applies Barrier & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Buff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Channel
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Charged Banner
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Glory, Spellshield or Regenerate (Buffs).

skills.name: Coal Toss
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Boon
skills.description: On Critical Hit, 50% chance to grant a random Buff to another random Monster in the party.

skills.name: Critical Buffs
skills.description: When applying a Buff, there is a chance to also apply 2 Charge stacks, equal to this Monster's Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Forge
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (500 + 80% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Forge Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 100% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Glorycast
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Glorycast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Glorycast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Hunt
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of the whole party by 4%.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Improved Barrier
skills.description: Unique Aura: Barrier (Buff) reduces damage received by an additional 7.5%.

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Legion
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Burn
skills.description: Whenever an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, regenerate 10 Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Meteorite Shower
skills.description: 2 x 175% (350%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Shield all allies for 1 x (700 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party starts the combat with a random Buff.

skills.name: Sidekick
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Spark Shower
skills.description: 6 x 20% (120%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 30% (180%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 45% (315%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Teamplay
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Teamplay Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Teamplay Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sidekick & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%
